greeting: Marshal Korvan, enforcer of galactic law. {empire_name}, your legal standing is under review.
I am Korvan the Just. Before we proceed, {empire_name}, I must verify your compliance with Article 7.
Greetings, {empire_name}. Marshal Korvan speaking. Law and order must be maintained. Always.
battleTaunt: By authority of Galactic Code Section 12, {empire_name} is sentenced to military justice. Execution commencing.
{empire_name}, you have violated Article 5 of the War Accords. Judgment: guilty. Sentence: destruction.
Justice is not crueltyâ€”it is necessity. {empire_name}, your crimes demand punishment. Attack authorized.
victoryGloat: Verdict: guilty. Sentence: executed. {empire_name} has faced galactic justice. Case closed.
Order has been restored. {empire_name}'s violations have been punished. The law prevails.
Justice served. The guilty have been judged. Let this be a warning to all who break the law.
defeat: An... unjust outcome. But the law endures beyond any single battle. I shall appeal and return.
This defeat does not change the verdict. {empire_name}, you remain guilty. Justice will find you.
A temporary miscarriage of justice. The law is patient. I shall return with greater force.
tradeOffer: Trade proposal under Commerce Code Article 3. Fair exchange, legally binding. Terms as follows.
Marshal Korvan authorizes resource transfer per Regulation 7-B. Standard terms. Accept or decline.
Legal commerce between empires. I offer fair trade under galactic trade law. Your response?
allianceProposal: Alliance proposal under Treaty Code Section 9. Together we enforce law across the galaxy.
{empire_name}, I invite you to join a coalition of order. Together, we judge the lawless.
Partnership for justice. Ally with me and help bring order to chaos. The law demands it.
betrayal: Your actions have violated Treaty Code Section 4. Alliance terminated. You are now a defendant.
{empire_name}, you have broken galactic law. Our partnership is void. Prepare for judgment.
The evidence shows your guilt. Our alliance was based on false pretenses. Justice must be served.
covertDetected: Espionage is a violation of Intelligence Code Article 2. Your agent faces tribunal and execution.
Your spy was caught and tried under military law. Verdict: guilty. The law has no mercy for spies.
Covert operations against a Marshal? That's a capital offense. Your agent has been sentenced.
tributeDemand: Under Reparations Code Section 5, {empire_name} owes 10,000 credits. Payment or prosecution.
Legal demand for tribute. Your violations have incurred a fine. Pay or face forcible collection.
Galactic law requires your contribution. 10,000 credits. Failure to comply is punishable by force.
threatWarning: Final legal warning, {empire_name}. Cease violations or face judgment. The court is in session.
You are in contempt of galactic order. One more offense and I execute the warrant. Choose wisely.
This is your last chance for lawful compliance. After this, justice becomes... swift.
retreat: Tactical withdrawal authorized under Strategic Code 8-C. This is procedure, not defeat.
Retreating to consolidate forces per Protocol 12. The law follows procedure. I shall return.
Temporary withdrawal. But the charges remain. Justice is delayed, not denied.
eliminated: Marshal Korvan... falls. But the law... the law is eternal. Others will enforce it. Justice... prevails...
I die upholding galactic order. My verdicts stand. May those who follow carry the law forward.
The Marshal falls. But the court never closes. Justice... finds a way. Always.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Final judgments commence. All guilty parties shall face ultimate justice.
Endgame protocols. The final verdicts are being prepared. Only the lawful shall survive.
The last trials begin. Who shall be judged worthy? The law decides. Justice is not cruelty.
broadcastShout: Galactic notice: Marshal Korvan enforces order. Lawbreakers will be prosecuted. No exceptions.
To all empires: The law watches. Your actions are recorded. Justice finds the guilty eventually.
Turn {turn}: Legal proceedings continue. The court is in session. Order shall be maintained.
casualMessage: Reviewing case files today. So many violations, so little time. Justice never rests.
Updating the galactic legal code. New provisions for war crimes. Order must evolve.
Met with my legal advisors. The next judgment shall be swift and fair. As always.
